content: the perfect blend of comfort and style this waffle knit-look henley top is ready for whatever life throws at you brunch with friends the side-gig hustle date night or a casual night by the fire can work for this sweater it all just depends on how you choose to rock it this pattern is also available to view for free on my blog or you can purchase the ad-free printable pdf here on ravelry **what s included ** 8 page printable pdf download written instructions for women s sizes xs-5x size chart and schematic link to video stitch tutorial **pattern difficulty ** intermediate **construction of garment ** sweater is worked flat in one piece and then folded and sewn together **sizing & yardage ** finished circumference length yardage xs- 33 22 2041 s - 37 23 2289 m - 40 23 2475 l - 45 23 5 2784 xl - 48 24 2970 2x - 53 25 3279 3x - 57 25 3527 4x - 60 25 5 3713 5x - 64 26 3960 **yarn ** wecrochet twill fingering 100% fine superwash merino wool 100g/366 yards men s version https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mens-apricity-henley-crochet-sweater 1 all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 2 ** 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mens-apricity-henley-crochet-sweater 2 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
